actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senate parties in W. Henson Moore, et. al. v. The United States House of Representatives, et. al. and in Ron Paul v. The United States of America, et. al., Civil Action Nos. 82-2318 and 82-2353, respectively.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Senate, the President of the Senate, and the Secretary of the Senate, in the cases of W. Henson Moore, et al. v. The House of Representatives, et al. and Ron Paul v. The United States of America, et al.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senate parties in W. Henson Moore, et. al. v. The United States House of Representatives, et. al. and in Ron Paul v. The United States of America, et. al., Civil Action Nos. 82-2318 and 82-2353, respectively.
